assetName: Building data pipelines with AWS Glue and Amazon Athena
assetDesc: This course covers how to build scalable and cost-effective data pipelines using AWS Glue, a fully managed ETL service, and Amazon Athena, a serverless query service. Participants will learn how to transform and process data in various formats and use Athena to query and analyze data stored in Amazon S3.

assetName: Building Microservices with Azure Service Fabric
assetDesc: This course teaches how to design, develop, and deploy microservices-based applications using Azure Service Fabric, a distributed systems platform. assetName: Building real-time applications with AWS AppSync
assetDesc: This course teaches how to build real-time applications using AWS AppSync, a fully managed GraphQL service. assetDesc: This course covers how to design, develop, and deploy scalable and resilient cloud-based applications using microservices architecture. Participants will learn how to build and manage microservices, use container orchestration platforms such as Kubernetes and Docker Swarm, and integrate with cloud-native services such as AWS Lambda and Azure Functions.

assetName: Building Serverless Applications on Azure

assetName: Building serverless applications with AWS Lambda
assetDesc: This course covers how to build and deploy serverless applications using AWS Lambda, a compute service that runs code in response to events. Participants will learn how to create and deploy Lambda functions, use serverless data storage and messaging services, and integrate with other AWS services.

assetDesc: This course covers the basics of artificial intelligence and machine learning, and how to leverage cloud-based AI services such as AWS AI, Google Cloud AI, and Azure AI to build intelligent applications. Participants will learn how to use AI services for image and speech recognition, natural language processing, and predictive analytics.

assetName: Cloud Analytics: Driving Business Insights with Data

Participants will learn how to create data pipelines, perform data transformations and aggregations, and visualize data using BI tools.

assetName: Cloud Automation: Streamlining Your Business Processes

Participants will learn how to create and manage workflows, integrate with other cloud services, and monitor and troubleshoot automation processes.

assetDesc: This course provides insights on securing cloud environments and protecting businesses from cyber threats using tools like AWS Security Hub, Azure Security Center, and Google Cloud Armor.
